title: An Arundel Tomb to look not read

content.prompt: In context, the expression “To look, not read” (line 25) affects the pacing of the poem by implying a shift in time that has which effect?

choices.label: It underscores a major change in the social function of the tomb.
It shows that the speaker has little understanding of the tomb’s history.
It reveals that the speaker has accepted the fluctuations of time.
It offers an ironic comment on the speaker’s knowledge of Latin.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe how plot orders events in a narrative.
